name: StellarNotes
description:
This is a project done for the Women's In Games Game Jam of 2021!

The theme was Atmosphere!

Set In space, you play as a character that has managed to lose her way. 

Your Objective?  Call for Help!

Music is going to be your biggest ally in this cold endless space and will be your only source of protection.

Hope you enjoy!
